messages.content: You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. Living in the best possible health is very important to you. You are someone who I neutral with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings never. I agree that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I neutral that my well-being is good. I agree that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I unknown that I am agreeable and kind. I unknown that I am dependable and organized. I unknown that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I am just a young adult so I have a clear enough mind to understand basic health information and services I need to make health decisions. When I don't understand something clearly, I can easily use the internet to search for more information, or perhaps contact a local health provider to ask questions in person.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I've met many rude doctors in my short life. It seems like there are may people that become doctors for the wrong reasons. When I find a competent and compassionate doctor it almost seems like finding a rare gem. I think most of them are competent of course, but few have what it takes to interact with patients appropriately.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
Coming out with some diagnosis that I did not expect. Also coming up with something that would be expensive to treat.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
Can't really say much, except for knowing to take care of myself extra well when I've come down with a sickness like a really bad cold.

You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. You are someone who I disagree with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings rarely. I agree that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I agree that my well-being is good. I neutral that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I unknown that I am agreeable and kind. I unknown that I am dependable and organized. I neutral that I am emotionally stable and calm. I strongly agree that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I think I have a good ability to make health decisions because I am able to read and understand medical information, as long as it is geared towards the general public. I am generally confident in asking questions of providers if I'm unsure. I have a good grasp of English and try to be prepared to get information when I see a doctor.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I generally trust doctors because it is in their interest to make people feel better, and they have the training to do that. I think it takes a lot of caring for others to be a doctor and most physicians have the patient's best interests at heart. Most of them are proud of what they do and want to do well.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

I worry about all the things that could be wrong with me that I didn't notice, but the doctor might find out. These might be expensive to fix, or embarassing, or something that I was foolish not to notice on my own. I might not be in as good of health as I had thought.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

When I received a spider bite from an unknown spider, I knew that I should keep an eye on the bite in case it became serious. I drew a circle around the bite and watched to see if it became bigger. When it did, I went to the doctor and got treatment. I had an infection that was easily treatable.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

i feel very confident that i can understand any information that is given to me by my medical team.  any medical term that i do not understand i can ask them to explain and when i get time i can look it up on the internet
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
i trust my primary care physician for their knowledge of medicine.  but you have to ask question about your illness and the treatment you are being asked to undertake
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
i am already dealing with a few health issues myself.  so when i go to the doctor i am expecting unpleasant news.  it is like you found this last time now lets see what else we can find.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
i have not had any particular medical issues that i would have to show any medical knowledge of anything.  i have enough common sense to research and check on the latest data

excellent ability to do understand and make appropriate decisions on health issues as well as others
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
we have built a relationship, he knows what we desire and expect and all live up to the exceptions we have set
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
My only thoughts is a dislike of tests and being poked as well as prodded, not worries or anxiety really at all
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

My husband had an emergency open heart surgery, he had never been ill a day so this was new.  I was able to be the point person and keep documentation, orders, reports, issues, comments, etc. organized and he is not back to 100%.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I feel like I have the capacity somewhat to understand health information to make decisions. If things are too complicated or the doctor talks too fast, then I can always ask them to clarify or explain it to me again. I can also access a vast amount of information online to research any questions that I might have.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
While I do trust my doctor in general, I think it's always a good idea to do your own research and educate yourself as well before coming to any fil decisions about anything.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
When I go to the doctor's office I have a hard time not thinking of the worst possible outcome. All the uncertainty can give me anxiety.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

I am currently pregnt, so I have been doing a lot of research online about possible things that could affect my pregncy and make it more complicated. One thing is high blood pressure and how it is linked to pre-eclampsia. I read about how if you have high blood pressure then they will likely do a urine test to see if there is protein in it, which is a sign of pre-eclampsia. I can have high blood pressure sometimes, so it was no surprise to me when the midwife ordered a urine test to see if there was protein present.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.
I feel that for the most part i can understand what i am being told.  I have problems when it becomes too technical or sometimes when discussing how much insurance will cover vs my responsibility.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

They are experienced and i feel that they know more about what is going on than i do.  I don't feel they are swayed by drug vendors often but that thought has crossed my mind before.  Overall i feel trusting of doctors.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I just feel anxious sometimes that i may get bad news.  They may find cancer or something serious that i was not expecting that could be life changing.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
When giving my kids medicine i have to read the label to find the correct dosage and then measure out the correct amount before giving it to them.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I am pretty well versed in reading medical documents and understanding what my doctor and nurse have to say.  If I don't I know what questions to ask.  I understand all of my medications with the side effects and all treatments that are proposed to me.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

some doctors are just wrong with the diagnosis and treatment.  Some treatments are very difficult to accomplish by me.  Some doctors just order them and don't give a thought as to how hard it is on the client
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

That I may have some dread disease that cannot be cured or will take a log of treatments to cure.  That the chronic condition that I have has gotten worse or something is prescribed that I cannot accomplish
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
When I was told that I had cirrhosis of the liver stage 4, I knew where to look up the diet and treatment and what to do if it got worse.  I also found out what to consume and not consume

I unknown that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

Generally speaking, health documents are intimidating to approach but are understandable through repeated readings; furthermore, assistance is generally available if needed. I feel any decision related to health concerns are met with enough understanding to be properly accessed.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
I occasionally feel rushed when interacting with doctors. Although I know they make an effort to be efficient with their time, I sometimes feel as if they are sacrificing quality for efficiency.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

What makes me most anxious whenever I visit any doctor's office is uncertainty. When going to see a doctor, one never knows what may potentially arise in terms of a negative diagnosis. Thus, I am always a little bit on edge every time.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

A handful of years ago, I was a bit overweight and decided to shed the excess through monitoring my calorie intake. I intentionally consumed around 400 calories less daily than I was previously taking in and lost the excess weight in a matter of weeks.
